title: Quantum Cyber Security [ML B-Side]
description: Quantum Computing is a fascinating and revolutionary technology that has been gaining significant ground in the past decade, with researchers from both academia and the commercial sector - such as Google and IBM - announcing major breakthroughs every few weeks. Mike Redding, CTO of Quantropi, a company specializing in Quantum Encryption - claims that this revolution is even closer than most of us think.
